thread.section_title: TNT Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TNT | www.tnt.com
thread.title: Robert Jones

author: Robert Jones
title: Robert Jones
text: started shipping to china from uk with a business account, trouble is they do no know how to work tax/duties out and came out 10% dearer to me and my customer, all I was told was that is what china are charging them yet UPS and pitney bowes do a free landed costs Quote: and showed what it should be, account manager did not want to know as well. Gone to DHL now with their e-commerce account.
